comments:
Opened for IBM:

import an old project,
open a faces jsp page in IBM tooling and the following NPE error is logged during the Synchronize Page Data Model from Page Code File. The JSF page has ODC import tags in it, but no real data. It uses a page template though. 

!ENTRY com.ibm.etools.webtools.javamodel 4 0 2006-01-19 16:55:39.765
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.impl.ResourceTreeRoot.getDeployResourceTreeRoot(ResourceTreeRoot.java:119)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.resources.VirtualContainer.findMember(VirtualContainer.java:79)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.resources.VirtualContainer.findMember(VirtualContainer.java:55)
	at com.ibm.etools.jsf.util.JsfProjectUtil.isJsfProject(JsfProjectUtil.java:58)
	at com.ibm.etools.webtools.codebehind.pdm.data.SyncPageCodeMethodsToPageDataTask.executeTask(SyncPageCodeMethodsToPageDataTask.java:79)
	at com.ibm.etools.webtools.codebehind.pdm.data.SyncAllPageCodeMethodsToPageDataTask.executeTask(SyncAllPageCodeMethodsToPageDataTask.java:78)
	at com.ibm.etools.webtools.javamodel.api.AbstractJavaModelTask$1.run(AbstractJavaModelTask.java:72)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.BatchOperation.executeOperation(BatchOperation.java:39)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaModelOperation.run(JavaModelOperation.java:718)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1719)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.JavaCore.run(JavaCore.java:3761)
	at com.ibm.etools.webtools.javamodel.api.AbstractJavaModelTask.run(AbstractJavaModelTask.java:80)
	at com.ibm.etools.webtools.javamodel.jobs.JavaModelTaskJob.run(JavaModelTaskJob.java:85)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:76)

This was likely caused because the .component files are now under .settings and your old project couldn't find them.  I've added some more checking to avoid the NPE in this case, but you will still need to update your projects metadata.
